name: Czura Thornton
overview: Czura Thornton is a private investment firm. It was founded by Tony Czura and Nick Thornton in 2003. The firm invests primarily in growth opportunities in life sciences, international trade and in Eastern Europe. They seek opportunities where vision, capital and good management will realize superior value and returns.
